synopsis.text: Saint Seiya's epic saga continues as the twelve Gold Saints, after a grueling battle with Hades in the underworld, sacrifice their lives to shatter the Wailing Wall and clear the path for Seiya. However, the story doesn't end there, as Aiolia and the other Gold Saints find themselves reincarnated in a radiant, unfamiliar world. With the enigma of their resurrection looming large, Aiolia plunges headlong into a new battle. As he pushes his Cosmo to its peak, the Leo Cloth undergoes an extraordinary transformation. Witness the rebirth of the Golden Cosmo in 2015, as Saint Seiya embarks on a new, thrilling chapter!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
